list_definition.definition: to ask (someone) to take part in a contest

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He challenged his brother to a round of golf.

list_definition.definition: to question (someone’s authority or right, the truth of a statement etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: They challenged his authority to make such a decision

list_definition.mean_english: lời mời tham gia cuộc thi

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He accepted his brother’s challenge to a fight.

list_definition.definition: the act of questioning someone’s right, a statement etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The tenant was faced with a challenge to his right to occupy the property.

list_ex_of_english: This ordinance is challenged by a landlord who has no plans for conversion.
